settings.caption: ANNOUNCING ANOTHER GREAT TREATMENT OPTION FOR HAIR LOSS BY YATES HAIR SCIENCE GROUP.

settings.text:
In an effort to continually provide the most advanced and best treatment options for his patients, Dr. Yates is adding Scalp Micro Pigmentation to his practice.

With Scalp Micro Pigmentation treatment, pigment is used on the scalp to create the appearance of real hair follicles recreating hairlines, adding the appearance of density to thinning areas and covering unsightly scars. This advanced solution for hair loss replicates real shaven hair follicles on the scalp. The appearance is so realistic that it actually looks like you have hair. We know how the hair should look when pigmented, because that’s all we do everyday – HAIR! If someone has limited donor hair and has been told they were not a good candidate for a hair transplant procedure, they now have a great option! This is perfect for those who wear a very closely cropped hairstyle!
With follicular unit extraction there are no transverse visible scars across the back of the head

This is also a good solution for people who wear a very closely cropped hairstyle.This semi-permanent procedure generally takes two sessions that will occur about 30 days from each other and are applied in 4-6 hour sessions, lasting between 2-5 years. We take great measures to perfect this process and to match and enhance our clients’ individual appearances. By teaching our customers how to care for their scalps pre and post treatment, they attain the best results they never knew they could have.

Dr. Yates hand picks his technicians to assure the absolute highest level of care for his patients. They each specialize in every aspect of hair loss and hair restoration; so, providing scalp micro-pigmentation to create the illusion of a shortly shaved hair follicle is their specialty! Attention to detail and excellent skills will assure you have the best outcome possible. Each of our technicians has received extensive training and certification from a very specialized school and clinic that only performs Scalp Micro-Pigmentation. Most clinics that offer Scalp Micro Pigmentation, were trained by body tattoo or permanent makeup artists. We are confident you will be thrilled with your Scalp Micro Pigmentation procedure!Schedule your appointment today with Dr. Yates to see if you are a good candidate for this exciting new treatment!

settings.title: GETTING STARTED WITH SCALP MICRO PIGMENTATION
settings.info: If Scalp Micro Pigmentation sounds like a possible solution for you, see how Dr. Yates, the hair loss expert, can answer your questions and get you started.

settings.title: IS SCALP MICRO PIGMENTATION RIGHT FOR ME?
settings.info: If you are balding, have thinning hair, or want to disguise scars on the scalp portion of your head, Scalp Micro Pigmentation may be a beneficial option for you. The semi-permanent process recreates the look of actual hair follicles for a fuller, natural appearance with immediate results.

settings.title: WHEN WILL I SEE RESULTS?
settings.text: The good thing about Scalp Micro Pigmentation is that you have immediate results versus a hair transplant where you have to wait 6 months to a year for hair growth.

settings.title: WHAT DOES THE PROCEDURE COST?
settings.text: After a thorough evaluation of your individual situation and desired look, we can provide you with a more accurate estimation of your cost. Typically the range falls between $1,000 – $5,500, depending on the area.
